result.eng: Are you afraid?
result.ga: an bhfuil eagla ort
result.orig: An bhfuil eagla ort
result.html: an bhfuil eagla ortAre you afraid?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil eagla ortAre you afraid?

result.eng: I'm afraid that I will fail.
result.ga: tá eagla orm go dteipfidh orm
result.orig: Tá eagla orm go dteipfidh orm
result.html: tá eagla orm go dteipfidh ormI'm afraid that I will fail.
result.ponchtml: tá eagla orm go dteipfiḋ ormI'm afraid that I will fail.

result.eng: I'm scared of water.
result.ga: tá eagla orm roimh uisce
result.orig: Tá eagla orm roimh uisce
result.html: tá eagla orm roimh uisceI'm scared of water.
result.ponchtml: tá eagla orm roiṁ uisceI'm scared of water.

result.eng: I am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ga: tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.orig: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.html: tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ponchtml: tá eagla orm ní imeoiḋ tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?

result.eng: Don't be afraid, girl.
result.ga: ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.orig: Ná bíodh eagla ort a chailín
result.html: ná bíodh eagla ort a chailínDon't be afraid, girl.
result.ponchtml: ná bíoḋ eagla ort a ċailínDon't be afraid, girl.

result.eng: Some of the horses got scared.
result.ga: tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.orig: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.html: tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig eagla ar ċuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.

result.eng: She became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ga: tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.orig: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.html: tháinig eagla a báis uirthiShe became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig eagla a báis uirṫiShe became afraid of (her own) death.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ga: tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.orig: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.html: tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ponchtml: tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: It scares me to my skin.
result.ga: cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.orig: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.html: cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.
result.ponchtml: cuireann sé eagla mo ċraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: That scared the children.
result.ga: chuir sin eagla ar na páistí
result.orig: Chuir sin eagla ar na páistí
result.html: chuir sin eagla ar na páistíThat scared the children.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sin eagla ar na páistíThat scared the children.

result.eng: She was seized by fear.
result.ga: bhuail eagla í
result.orig: Bhuail eagla í
result.html: bhuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.

result.eng: The road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ga: dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.orig: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.html: dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ponchtml: dúnaḋ an bóṫar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.
result.ga: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla dé
result.orig: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.html: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla déThose of you who fear God.
result.ponchtml: siḃse ar a ḃfuil eagla déThose of you who fear God.

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.html: bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ponchtml: ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: We built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ga: thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.orig: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.html: thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ponchtml: ṫógamar claíṫe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saiġdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ga: ní ligfeadh an eagla do shéimí cur suas don obair
result.orig: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.html: ní ligfeadh an eagla do shéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ponchtml: ní ligfeaḋ an eagla do ẛéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.

result.eng: Nothing could scare me.
result.ga: ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
